name: deform
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ T ] to spoil the usual and true shape of something: Age deforms the spine.
[ I ]
  chemistry
  specialized If something deforms, its usual shape changes and becomes spoiled: These plastics deform at temperatures of over 90°C.

deformation
Add to word list
Add to word list
to change the shape or structure, esp. by using great pressure: Heat generated by intense pressure deforms the rock.
